item.title: Automation tooling essentials
item.author: karl.hepworth@gmail.com (Karl Hepworth)
item.description: I was recently approached by somebody on Slack to provide advice, look at some code and generally help out. Questions came up of which answers I generally take for granted - they were fundamental concepts which I simply had never articulated, and it got me wondering. Having to explain computer science concepts and terminology I took for granted was a challenge, however I’m confident I relayed valuable information. Around the same time, I found a script on Twitter which looked really interesting.
